XmlValidatorSender
AdvancedSendersEndpoint
Sender that validates the input message against a XML Schema. N.B. noNamespaceSchemaLocation may contain spaces, but not if the schema is stored in a .jar or .zip file on the class path.
See also

<XmlValidatorSender />
